events.title: App Development Workshop
events.description: Learn how to build cross-platform apps using Flutter and Firebase by building a real-time chat application.

events.title: UNO Social Mixer
events.description: An opportunity for UNO students to learn about and interact with Computing and Engineering-related clubs across campus.

events.title: Git Workshop
events.description: Learn the essentials of Git version control for seamless collaboration and project management.

events.title: Cloud Computing Workshop
events.description: Learn the basics of cloud computing using Amazon Web Services. Work towards an official AWS certification.

events.title: UNO Hack 2025
events.description: A 48-hour innovation sprint where students turn bold ideas into reality with code.
